means: 偶像破坏的，打破旧习的

sentence.Network_en: Is it utopian to hope that such iconoclastic ideas will gain ground?
sentence.Network_cn: 希望如此有悖传统观念的思想会发展普及，这是不是太理想化了？

sentence.Network_en: His iconoclastic tendencies can get him into trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 他与传统信仰相悖的思想倾向可能会给他带来麻烦。

sentence.Network_en: The film is an iconoclastic allegory.
sentence.Network_cn: 电影是一个关于破坏的寓言.

两次圣像破坏运动(iconoclastic movement)。该运动颇表现拜占庭人宗教政治艺术概念。
因此才有“破坏圣像运动”（Iconoclastic Movement）。关于这一点，宗教改革所产生的新教，是同中世纪的天主教有所区别的。

The film is an iconoclastic allegory ., 电影是一个关于破坏的寓言.

entry.def: If you describe someone or their words or ideas as iconoclastic, you mean that they contradict established beliefs.

example.ex: Is it utopian to hope that such iconoclastic ideas will gain ground?...
example.tran: 希望如此有悖传统观念的思想会发展普及，这是不是太理想化了？

example.ex: His iconoclastic tendencies can get him into trouble.
example.tran: 他与传统信仰相悖的思想倾向可能会给他带来麻烦。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by attack on established beliefs or institutions

auth_sentence.content: The lyrics are iconoclastic and yet resonate with relevance even today.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lyrics are iconoclastic and yet resonate with relevance even today.

auth_sentence.content: She was also an iconoclastic politician even though she was a Conservative.
